name: Turn Based Tower Defense - Proof of Concept
name_original: Turn Based Tower Defense - Proof of Concept
description:
Hopefully very straight forward, build towers, defeat enemies, survive.

Click on tiles to open the building dialogue, towers sell for half their value. While the game is paused you can mouse over enemies to see what damaged them.

Tower info: https://pastebin.com/AKcmRvQk

Score = Score + Lives * 100 + $ * 10

You can create and play your own levels by editing "-.ini" files, to open them just type their name in the text field when launching the game(It registers all input but only displays capitalized input for now).

I'd appreciate if you could fill out this survey after testing the game: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfhN1JQbST2Wzhdjr_mLRY6uWy12KpJwm4Djlii...

You can contact me in the comments or on Discord Xiniu#5651
